byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and NICK CORASANITI

abstract: Donald Trump's presidential campaign faces question of whether its large number of volunteers will be effective in driving his New Hampshire supporters to polls; questions about campaign's ground game have been raised in wake of lackluster Iowa results, and people within campaign have complained about not receiving resources they have requested.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s campaign definitely has a lot of volunteers, but it appears to lack the basics of a good field organization with the ability to identify, target and turn out voters.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Ground Game Questioned After Iowa Showing
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Ground Game May Still Lack Basics

snippet: Mr. Trump’s campaign definitely has a lot of volunteers, but it appears to lack the basics of a good field organization with the ability to identify, target and turn out voters.
